verses.text_plain: When the Lord turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
verses.verse_html:
1When the Lord turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream. ▼
▼ turned…: Heb. returned the returning

tokens.pos: proper noun with reference to deity
tokens.definition: יְהֹוָה Yᵉhôvâh, yeh-ho-vaw'; from H1961 ; (the) self-Existent or Eternal; Jeho-vah, Jewish national name of God:—Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 , H3069 .
tokens.kjv_translation_count: LORD (6,: 510x), GOD (4x), JEHOVAH (4x), variant (1x).
outline: Jehovah = "the existing One" the proper name of the one true God unpronounced except with the vowel pointings of H 136
the proper name of the one true God unpronounced except with the vowel pointings of H 136
unpronounced except with the vowel pointings of H 136

tokens.definition: שׁוּב shûwb, shoob; a primitive root; to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again:—((break, build, circumcise, dig, do anything, do evil, feed, lay down, lie down, lodge, make, rejoice, send, take, weep)) × again, (cause to) answer ( again), × in any case (wise), × at all, averse, bring (again, back, home again), call (to mind), carry again (back), cease, × certainly, come again (back), × consider, continually, convert, deliver (again), deny, draw back, fetch home again, × fro, get (oneself) (back) again, × give (again), go again (back, home), (go) out, hinder, let, (see) more, × needs, be past, × pay, pervert, pull in again, put (again, up again), recall, recompense, recover, refresh, relieve, render (again), requite, rescue, restore, retrieve, (cause to, make to) return, reverse, reward, say nay, send back, set again, slide back, still, × surely, take back (off), (cause to, make to) turn (again, self again, away, back, back again, backward, from, off), withdraw.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: return (391x), ...again (248x), turn (123x), ...back (65x), ...away (56x), restore (39x), bring (34x), render (19x), answer (18x), recompense (8x), recover (6x), deliver (5x), put (5x), withdraw (5x), requite (4x), miscellaneous (40x).
outline: to return, turn back (Qal) to turn back, return to turn back to return, come or go back to return unto, go back, come back of dying of human relations (fig) of spiritual relations (fig) to turn back (from God), apostatise to turn away (of God) to turn back (to God), repent turn back (from evil) of inanimate things in repetition (Polel) to bring back to restore, refresh, repair (fig) to lead away (enticingly) to show turning, apostatise (Pual) restored (participle) (Hiphil) to cause to return, bring back to bring back, allow to return, put back, draw back, give back, restore, relinquish, give in payment to bring back, refresh, restore to bring back, report to, answer to bring back, make requital, pay (as recompense) to turn back or backward, repel, defeat, repulse, hinder, reject, refuse to turn away (face), turn toward to turn against to bring back to mind to show a turning away to reverse, revoke (Hophal) to be returned, be restored, be brought back (Pulal) brought back

tokens.definition: שִׁיבָה shîybâh, shee-baw'; by permutation from H7725 ; a return (of property):—captivity.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: captivity (1x).

tokens.definition: צִיּוֹן Tsîyôwn, tsee-yone'; the same (regularly) as H6725 ; Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem:—Zion.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: Zion (153x), Sion (1x).
outline: Zion = "parched place" another name for Jerusalem especially in the prophetic books
another name for Jerusalem especially in the prophetic books

tokens.text: we were like them that dream
tokens.definition: חָלַם châlam, khaw-lam'; a primitive root; properly, to bind firmly, i.e. (by implication) to be (causatively to make) plump; also (through the figurative sense of dumbness) to dream:—(cause to) dream(-er), be in good liking, recover.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: to dream (29x).
outline: to dream (Qal) to dream (ordinary) to dream (prophetic) to dream (of false prophets) (Hiphil) to dream
(Qal) to dream (ordinary) to dream (prophetic) to dream (of false prophets)
to be healthy, be strong (Qal) to be healthy (Hiphil) to restore to health

footnotes.body_html: ▼ turned…: Heb. returned the returning

verses.text_plain: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The Lord hath done great things for them.
verses.verse_html:
2Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The Lord hath done great things for them. ▼
▼ hath…: Heb. hath magnified to do with them

tokens.definition: פֶּה peh, peh; from H6284 ; the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to:—accord(-ing as, -ing to), after, appointment, assent, collar, command(-ment), × eat, edge, end, entry, file, hole, × in, mind, mouth, part, portion, × (should) say(-ing), sentence, skirt, sound, speech, × spoken, talk, tenor, × to, two-edged, wish, word.

outline: (peh) mouth mouth (of man) mouth (as organ of speech) mouth (of animals) mouth, opening, orifice (of a well, river, etc) extremity, end

(pim) a weight equal to one third of a shekel, occurs only in 1 Sa. 13:: 21

tokens.definition: מָלֵא mâlêʼ, maw-lay'; or מָלָא mâlâʼ; (Esther 7:5), a primitive root; to fill or (intransitively) be full of, in a wide application (literally and figuratively):—accomplish, confirm, consecrate, be at an end, be expired, be fenced, fill, fulfil, (be, become, × draw, give in, go) full(-ly, -ly set, tale), (over-) flow, fulness, furnish, gather (selves, together), presume, replenish, satisfy, set, space, take a (hand-) full, have wholly.

(Qal) to be full fulness, abundance (participle) to be full, be accomplished, be ended to consecrate, fill the hand

tokens.definition: שְׂחוֹק sᵉchôwq, sekh-oke'; or שְׂחֹק sᵉchôq; from H7832 ; laughter (in merriment or defiance):—derision, laughter(-ed to scorn, -ing), mocked, sport.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: laughter (6x), derision (5x), laughing (1x), mock (1x), laugh to scorn (1x), sport (1x).

tokens.definition: לָשׁוֹן lâshôwn, law-shone'; or לָשֹׁן lâshôn; also (in plural) feminine לְשֹׁנָה lᵉshônâh; from H3960 ; the tongue (of man or animals), used literally (as the instrument of licking, eating, or speech), and figuratively (speech, an ingot, a fork of flame, a cove of water):— babbler, bay, evil speaker, language, talker, tongue, wedge.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: tongue (98x), language (10x), bay (3x), wedge (2x), babbler (1x), flame (1x), speaker (with H 376) (1x), talkers (1x).

tokens.definition: רִנָּה rinnâh, rin-naw'; from H7442 ; properly, a creaking (or shrill sound), i.e. shout (of joy or grief):—cry, gladness, joy, proclamation, rejoicing, shouting, sing(-ing), triumph.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: cry (12x), singing (9x), rejoicing (3x), joy (3x), gladness (1x), proclamation (1x), shouting (1x), sing (1x), songs (1x), triumph (1x).

tokens.definition: אָמַר ʼâmar, aw-mar'; a primitive root; to say (used with great latitude):—answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, × desire, determine, × expressly, × indeed, × intend, name, × plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), × still, × suppose, talk, tell, term, × that is, × think, use (speech), utter, × verily, × yet.

outline: to say, speak, utter (Qal) to say, to answer, to say in one's heart, to think, to command, to promise, to intend (Niphal) to be told, to be said, to be called (Hithpael) to boast, to act proudly (Hiphil) to avow, to avouch

tokens.definition: גּוֹי gôwy, go'-ee; rarely (shortened) גֹּי gôy; apparently from the same root as H1465 (in the sense of massing); a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts:—Gentile, heathen, nation, people.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: nation (374x), heathen (143x), Gentiles (30x), people (11x).
outline: nation, people nation, people usually of non-Hebrew people of descendants of Abraham of Israel of swarm of locusts, other animals (fig.) proper masculine noun Goyim? = "nations"

tokens.definition: אָפִיק ʼâphîyq, aw-feek'; from H622 ; properly, containing, i.e. a tube; also a bed or valley of a stream; also a strong thing or a hero:—brook, channel, mighty, river, scale, stream, strong piece.

tokens.definition: נֶגֶב negeb, neh'-gheb; from an unused root meaning to be parched; the south (from its drought); specifically, the Negeb or southern district of Judah, occasionally, Egypt (as south to Palestine):—south (country, side, -ward).
tokens.kjv_translation_count: south (89x), southward (16x), south side (5x), south country (2x).
outline: south-country, Nekeb, south south-country region of southern Judah, boundaries not specific south
south-country region of southern Judah, boundaries not specific
region of southern Judah, boundaries not specific

verses.text_plain: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
verses.verse_html:
5They that sow in tears shall reap in joy. ▼
▼ joy: or, singing

tokens.definition: זָרַע zâraʻ, zaw-rah'; a primitive root; to sow; figuratively, to disseminate, plant, fructify:—bear, conceive seed, set with sow(-er), yield.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: sow (47x), yielding (3x), sower (2x), bearing (1x), conceive (1x), seed (1x), set (1x).

(Niphal) to be sown to become pregnant, be made pregnant
to become pregnant, be made pregnant

tokens.definition: דִּמְעָה dimʻâh, dim-aw'; feminine of H1831 ; weeping:—tears.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: tear (23x).

tokens.definition: קָצַר qâtsar, kaw-tsar'; a primitive root; to dock off, i.e. curtail (transitive or intransitive, literal or figurative); especially to harvest (grass or grain):— × at all, cut down, much discouraged, grieve, harvestman, lothe, mourn, reap(-er), (be, wax) short(-en, -er), straiten, trouble, vex.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: reap (22x), reaper (8x), shortened (5x), shorter (2x), discouraged (1x), lothed (1x), straitened (1x), miscellaneous (9x).
outline: to be short, be impatient, be vexed, be grieved (Qal) to be short (Piel) to shorten (Hiphil) to shorten
to reap, harvest (Qal) to reap, harvest (Hiphil) to reap, harvest

tokens.definition: רִנָּה rinnâh, rin-naw'; from H7442 ; properly, a creaking (or shrill sound), i.e. shout (of joy or grief):—cry, gladness, joy, proclamation, rejoicing, shouting, sing(-ing), triumph.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: cry (12x), singing (9x), rejoicing (3x), joy (3x), gladness (1x), proclamation (1x), shouting (1x), sing (1x), songs (1x), triumph (1x).
outline: ringing cry of entreaty, supplication in proclamation, joy, praise

verses.text_plain: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
verses.verse_html:
6He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him. ▼
▼ precious…: or, seed basket

tokens.definition: יָלַךְ yâlak, yaw-lak'; a primitive root (compare H1980 ); to walk (literally or figuratively); causatively, to carry (in various senses):— × again, away, bear, bring, carry (away), come (away), depart, flow, follow(-ing), get (away, hence, him), (cause to, made) go (away, -ing, -ne, one's way, out), grow, lead (forth), let down, march, prosper, pursue, cause to run, spread, take away (-journey), vanish, (cause to) walk(-ing), wax, × be weak.
